column4: Hey, I'm having trouble getting ubuntu 8.04 to detect the on-board bluetooth in my inspiron 1520. Any ideas? The hardware switch is enabled but ubuntu won't detect it.
Adjust your xorg.conf from the command line joonasl_.
Adjust your xorg.conf from the command line sijmen even
even in failsafe I get this. I have no idea how to get to a command line now. even alt+ctrl+# doesn't get me to a console
